CustomField.description: Included in Jitterbit API_11_Upsert_Reservation Request & Process_4_Upsert_Reservations Request transformations. Used in the Org Amount Due Before Taxes & Discounts field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Gross value before taxes and discounts. Used in the Org Amount Due Before Taxes & Discounts field.
CustomField.label: Current Charges Before Taxes & Discounts
